author: Maryann Moschides
title: Major Brands Integrate Scanbuy’s Mpromo Couponing Service Into Their Mobile Strategies
text:
Scanbuy, Inc., the global leader in mobile marketing, today announced that major brands are achieving exceptional results with mPromo , the company’s advanced mobile couponing solution. Retailers, brands, restaurants and others are using mPromo to drive in-store traffic, boost brand loyalty and increase sales by delivering personalized coupons directly to a consumer’s smartphone for redemption—when and where the consumer chooses. McDonalds, Nespresso, Heineken Group, and Coca-Cola all completed mobile coupon promotions using Scanbuy’s mobile couponing solutions.
Key features and functionality of mPromo include the ability to:
Create, track and manage multiple coupon campaigns Deliver unique coupon codes with fraud protection, and no repeat redemptions Drive in-store traffic with location integration Distribute mobile coupons easily, whether in-app, print or online Track real-time coupon acquisition and redemption Analyze detailed reporting, such as where and when coupons were acquired versus redeemed “mPromo is a powerful service that disrupts the traditional couponing ecosystem with a practical, cost-effective approach that works for any business or brand,” explained Chai Outmezguine, Scanbuy CEO and Co-Founder “Our clients are enjoying double-digit mobile coupon redemption rates time and time again. That’s unheard of—not only for traditional coupons, but also for digital coupons.”
For example, McDonald’s Spain recently integrated Scanbuy’s coupon service directly into the restaurant chain’s mobile application. The mobile coupons provided a free McFlurry when customers download the new McDonald’s application. Patrons then received instant coupons on their smartphones that may be redeemed at participating restaurants.
For years, companies around the world have turned to Scanbuy for state-of-the-art solutions related to mobile marketing and advertising management. The addition of mobile couponing to Scanbuy’s product suite provides brands and retailers with a low cost of entry, real-time redemption tracking and the flexibility to launch and adjust coupons as consumer interests change and business goals evolve.
